content.text: I love animals and I love math and science, so I'm studying to be a vet. I also love spending time with my family and friends and starting my day with a healthy breakfast.
Cool! I love Halloween and I'm hoping to have a spooky proposal with a lot of sci-fi and horror elements. I also love to express myself through poetry and makeup.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I hope your proposal goes well. I love to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy.
Thanks! I love dogs. What kind of dog is Percy?
Percy is a Goldendoodle. He's the sweetest dog ever.
Goldendoodles are so cute! I've always wanted one.
You should get one! They're great dogs.
So, what are you looking forward to this weekend?
I'm going to spend some time with my family and friends. We're going to go to the zoo and then have a barbecue.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going to the zoo.
Me too! It's always so much fun to see all the animals.
I hope you have a great time!
